item.description:
CASTLE IN THE CLOUDS
455 OSSIPEE PARK ROAD
MOULTONBOROUGH, NH
AUGUST 16, 2009
LEAVING AT 10:00 AM
ENTRANCE FEE: $12.00 ADULT
$ 9.00 SENIOR
$ 5.00 YOUTH

A day of hiking in the White Mountains of NH, come join JanetM and Friends. Call to make arrangements for car pooling. Castle in the Clouds opens at 10:00. I will meet everyone up there. Bring your lunch, water. Share cost of gas with the driver if you are car pooling, and your entrance fee.
JanetM: Redscarlet56@gmail.com; 802-282-6202
item.how_to_find_us: PARKING AT TRUCK STOP LEFT SIDE: LIGHT GREEN RAV 4 WITH MEETUP INTHE WINDOW & VT PLATES

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: "CASTLE IN THE CLOUDS" HIKING TRIP
